name: Element_getElementsMatchingOwnTextTest
description: Unit tests for the getElementsMatchingOwnText method of the Element class.

test_cases.name: testGetElementsMatchingOwnText_ValidRegex
test_cases.description: Tests the getElementsMatchingOwnText method with a valid regex pattern.

test_cases.name: testGetElementsMatchingOwnText_InvalidRegex
test_cases.description: Tests the getElementsMatchingOwnText method with an invalid regex pattern, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
